row.process:
! Validating Input :SET &COUNT# = 0 :IF &UC4RB_JSN_JSON_FILE# EQ "" : SET &COUNT# = &COUNT# + 1 :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_JSN_JSON# EQ "" : SET &COUNT# = &COUNT# + 1 :ENDIF :IF &COUNT# NE 1 : STOP MSG, 50, "Please provide either JSON file path or JSON content." :ENDIF
@echo off
! ---------------------------------- Building java arguments --------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JSON.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCE : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN
! Define action specific java options and values : SET &ACTION_NAME# = "AddUpdateObjectAction"
! Build java arguments : SET &UC4RB_JSN_CMD# = 'java -jar "&UC4RB_JSN_PATH_JAR#"' : SET &UC4RB_JSN_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JSN_CMD#, " -action &ACTION_NAME#")
! json : IF &UC4RB_JSN_JSON_FILE# NE "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_JSN_JSON_FILE# : ELSE : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JSON.PUB.INCLUDE.WRITE_JSON_TO_FILE : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_TEMP_FILE_PATH# : ENDIF : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JSON.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@WIN : SET &UC4RB_JSN_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JSN_CMD#, " -json &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! path : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_JSN_PATH# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JSON.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@WIN : SET &UC4RB_JSN_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JSN_CMD#, " -path &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! key : IF &UC4RB_JSN_KEY# NE "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_JSN_KEY# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JSON.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@WIN : SET &UC4RB_JSN_CMD# = STR_CAT( &UC4RB_JSN_CMD# , " -key &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#") : ENDIF
! value type : SET &UC4RB_JSN_CMD# = STR_CAT( &UC4RB_JSN_CMD# , " -valuetype &UC4RB_JSN_VALUE_TYPE#")
! overwrite : SET &UC4RB_JSN_CMD# = STR_CAT( &UC4RB_JSN_CMD# , " -overwrite &UC4RB_JSN_OVERWRITE#")
! value : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_JSN_VALUE# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JSON.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@WIN : SET &UC4RB_JSN_CMD# = STR_CAT( &UC4RB_JSN_CMD# , " -value &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! Modified download file path : IF &UC4RB_JSN_DWNLD_PATH# NE "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_JSN_DWNLD_PATH# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JSON.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@WIN : SET &UC4RB_JSN_CMD# = STR_CAT( &UC4RB_JSN_CMD# , " -downloadPath &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#") : ENDIF
: PRINT &UC4RB_JSN_CMD#
&UC4RB_JSN_CMD#
! Status messages : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** ADD UPDATE JSON CONTENT ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** ADD UPDATE JSON CONTENT ACTION FAILED ********"
! ------------------------------------------ ERROR HANDLING ---------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JSON.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS@WIN

row.post_process:
:SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE") :SET &UC4RB_JSN_UPDATED_JSON# = ""
:IF &STATUS# EQ 0 : SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT("JOBS",, "REP","UC4RB_JSN_*","COL=DELIMITER", 'DELIMITER=*::=*') : PROCESS &HND# : SET &KEY# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,1) : SET &UC4RB_JSN_UPDATED_JSON# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,2) : ENDPROCESS : CLOSE_PROCESS &HND# :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_JSN_JSON# NE "" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JSON.PUB.INCLUDE.DELETE_TMP_FILE :ENDIF :PUBLISH &UC4RB_JSN_UPDATED_JSON#,,"WORKFLOW"
